title: Assur Archive 49
description: In the area of private houses in gB9I, excavators discovered a small archive of 3 clay tablets and an envelope. The archive, dating between 655 and postcanonical 641* BC, consists of loan documents concerning silver and barley.

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Assur on the basis of Peders√©n 1987 Plan(s) 62.
properties.title: Plan location of Assur Archive 49
